mapper.select:
select d.pt_no,d.today
,d.cleaning
,d.wash
,d.shower
,d.report
,d.inputdate
,m.breakfast
,m.lunch
,m.dinner
,m.snack
,e.text
,b.timetobed
,dr.text as drtext
from daily d
, meal m
, exercise e
, bedtime b
, dr_op dr
where m.pt_no=#{pt_no} and to_char(m.today,'yyyy/mm/dd')=#{today}
and e.pt_no=#{pt_no} and to_char(e.today,'yyyy/mm/dd')=#{today}
and b.pt_no=#{pt_no} and to_char(b.today,'yyyy/mm/dd')=#{today}
and dr.pt_no=#{pt_no} and to_char(dr.today,'yyyy/mm/dd')=#{today}
